String.string: [Important] Rescue Mission
"Stay safe."
Speak with Amarre at the path to the prison.
You see Naga Knights as you cross the bridge.
Go to the prison.
Defeat the Naga Knights on your way to the prison.
Speak with the villager at the prison.
Defeat the Draakon Lieutenant in the prison.
Speak with the frightened villager at the prison.
Prison Hill
You see a very calm villager.
Go to the Prison Hill.
Speak with the calm villager.
Defeat the Draakon Pursuers in the prison.
Go inside the prison.
Prison Entrance
Elleon is surrounded by nagas.
Enter the Interrogation Center.
Defeat the Naga Knights and Naga Assassins.
Speak with Elleon in the prison.
Defeat the Draakon Pursuers, Draakon Lieutenant, and Draakon Ravagers.
"Let's go."
Speak with Titus in the prison.
Prison Exit
Elleon's traces are blocked by boulders.
Jump in the hole next to Titus and find the prison exit.
Remove the boulders and escape.
Speak with Titus in the Dazzling Garden.
